entry.title: How to change the setting of Key User Extensibility in the APP:Extensibility Settings
entry.content:
Dear Experts

I created a new UI Adaptation and want to use Export Software Collection to transfer it from the Develop environment to the Test environment.

When using Extensibility Settings to configure the transfer, I noticed that Key User Extensibility and Key User Development are set to OFF and NO, and both buttons are grayed out.

I now need to enable both to ON or YES, but I'm unsure which app to use and the specific steps involved.

 

Any insights or examples would be really appreciated.

Thanks!

YIN

entry.title: Where can I find this App ?
entry.content:
Dear everyone

Is there anyone who can tell me why I can't find this app in 2508　→　Export Extensibility Template

(even when using short keywords for the search.......)

 

Thanks !

YIN

entry.title: Open Vendor Items Migration
entry.content:
Hello everyone!

Is it possible to upload a vendor invoice and down payment with a purchase order using the migration template for open vendor items? I can't find a field in the migration template to include the purchase order reference.

If this can't be done through the template, what alternatives would be available in this case?

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Problems with migration object Product - extend existing record by new org levels
entry.content:
Dear all,

I am in the migration phase in my project. I have created a separated project for the migration object Product - extend existing record by new org levels and tried to upload a file with several materials and plants, but I get an error message from the app. I made a test with 3 materials that need to be extended in 3 different plants, so I created 9 lines, each one with a different RUN ID. Only one line per material has been simulated correctly, the other lines have been skipped to avoid multiple updates on same target instance. 

Do I have to prepare one file per plant? Or is there another way to centralize all the records in one file?

Thank you in advance.

Best regards,

Ornella

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud 2508 / Error during Upload of Pages
entry.content:
Hello Experts,
i have the following issue when trying to upload pages in a new starter customizing tenant.
What i wanted to do, was export custom pages from a different tenant which is part of internal system environment and import them in a new starter customizing tenant for workshops.
The system tells me that the pages cant be uploaded and this is the error message:

I think the issue is, that the system i downloaded the pages from, has german as its original language and the starter customizing system usually have english as the original language. 

My question is, can i do anything to solve this ? I tried changing some language keys from "DE" to "EN" in the json file that is imported, but this only results in the same error but with the translation "English(EN)" instead of "German(DE)" (compare screenshot).
Where can i even check what the original language of the tenant is ?

Best regards 
Lukas

entry.title: Questions on EBS SAP Public cloud
entry.content:
Hi Experts, 

We are encountering two issues in the Electronic Bank Statement process in SAP Public Cloud:

  1. We are unable to use document type ZR instead of SA.

  2. The system is not clearing entries automatically after uploading the bank statement. One entry posts correctly, but an additional entry is generated that debits and credits the clearing account. As a result, the amount in the main bank account remains uncleared.

entry.title: Stock Transfer of Project stock
entry.content:
Dear experts,

Is there any option to Transfer the stock after issued to Project. From one Project to another Project.

Best Regards,

Dinesh U

entry.title: Customer Master Data - SAP S/4 HANA PUBLIC CLOUD
entry.content:
Scenario: Parent–Child Customer Structure with Group-Wise Sales limit Control

We have a business requirement where a single parent customer has multiple child (around 40).
The objective is to ensure that the total sales value/inventory for the entire group does not exceed 100,000. Once this value is reached, the system should restrict further sales to any customer within the same group.

I Proposed a Solution

To achieve this, we can create a Value Contract (e.g., worth 100,000) with the Parent Customer as the Sold-To Party and assign all the Child Customers as Ship-To Parties.

  • Each child/location can place orders referencing this contract.
  • Once the total contract value is reached, the system will block further sales.

Now, I want to confirm —
 Is this the right and optimal solution, or is there a better approach to handle such a group-wise inventory or value control scenario in SAP?

Additionally, since one Sold-To Party(parent) has around 40 child customers, I’ll need to handle this via upload.
So, please also suggest a feasible uploading approach or tool/App, that can efficiently handle this scenario.

Best Regards,

Tehreem Fatima

entry.title: Sales & Delivery Report - SAP PUBLIC CLOUD
entry.content:
Hi,

We have a business requirement to create a Sales and Delivery Stock Report that should display the following key details:

  • Sales Order Quantity

  • On-Hand Quantity

  • Blocked Order Quantity

  • Dispatched Quantity

We are unable to find any standard report in SAP S/4HANA that covers all these fields together.
When attempting to build it using Custom Fields and Logic, we also noticed that there are no suitable CDS views available that provide a consolidated view of these data points.

Could anyone please suggest:

  1. Any standard report or app that can fulfill this requirement, or

  2. The relevant CDS views that can be used to retrieve these details —
    i.e. Sales Order Quantity, On-Hand Quantity, Blocked Orders, and Dispatched Orders.

Any guidance or references would be highly appreciated.

Thank you,

Tehreem Fatima

entry.title: SAP PUBLIC CLOUD
entry.content:
Is there any report available where base unit and sales unit is different and we see the exact record of the material and sales order according to the base unit.

Any guidance or references would be highly appreciated.

Thank you, 

Tehreem Fatima

entry.title: Fiori Launchpad for Sourcing and Procurement
entry.content:
Hi,

I am working on a client project in the SAP Public Cloud environment using the Fiori Launchpad for Sourcing and Procurement, I’ve been trying to locate the functionality related to tracking down payments on purchase orders. I’ve explored the available apps, used the search feature, and browsed through the tiles, but haven’t had any luck so far.

Is there a specific app or configuration I might be missing? Any guidance would be appreciated.

Kind regards,

Jack

entry.title: own asset number ranges
entry.content:
Dear all,

My client wants to create their own asset number ranges for custom asset classes, but I can't find this option in the configuration. Can anyone help?

entry.title: Splitting quantities across bins
entry.content:
Hi,

We’ve implemented the BADI /SCWM/EX_CORE_PTS_NBIN_NRM to allow mixed storage of the same material with different batch numbers, as our process does not involve receiving via handling units.

Before the implementation, the system would automatically split quantities across bins when the bin capacity was exceeded provided that the storage type allowed splitting. However, after activating the BADI, this automatic bin splitting no longer occurs.

Has anyone experienced this behaviour or found a solution to restore the standard bin splitting logic while keeping the BADI active?

Thanks in advance for your support.

Jack

entry.title: Mass maintenance catalog for business partners
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

We’ve recently upgraded to the latest release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud public edition, and I’ve noticed that the business catalog for mass maintenance of business partners specifically SAP_CMD_BC_BP_MASSMAINT_PC is no longer available.

Does anyone know which catalog now provides similar functionality? If there’s a new way to identify successor catalogs for deprecated ones, I’d appreciate any tips on how to approach that search.

Thanks in advance!

Jack

entry.title: FX evaluation
entry.content:
Hi,

I'm looking for clarification on how ledger setup impacts foreign exchange evaluation in S/4HANA Cloud (3SL). Our customer prefers the classic method for FX revaluation, which typically aligns with ledger 0L. However, the implementation partner has activated ledger 4G to support advanced FX evaluation features.

Is it feasible to run classic FX evaluation on 0L while leveraging 4G for the advanced version? The partner believes this dual setup might satisfy both preferences, but we’d like to confirm whether such a configuration is technically supported.

Any insights would be greatly appreciated.

Jack

entry.title: Need guidance on Bank reconciliation
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I am trying to understand the steps involved in bank reconciliation in SAP. I have already looked at the SAP Help Portal, but the documentation is quite overwhelming for me to read in detail.

Can anyone please break down the entire bank reconciliation process into simple blocks or steps?
A straightforward list or basic flow will be really helpful.
If you can also mention common tips or mistakes to avoid, that would be great.

Thank you in advance!

Best,

Nithin
